name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AdBlock U - Ad Blocker for Youtube

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes and skip all ads on YouTube™ undetected. Fast and reliable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The AdblockU for YouTube™ browser extension is a light and efficient ad blocker designed to eliminate all ads on YouTube™.

The extension is free, light and fast. It runs locally and does not collect anything. Nothing leaves your browser, ever.

This extension specifically targets banners, commercials, and pre-video ads commonly encountered on YouTube, enhancing your browsing experience.

# Effectively blocks ads, banners, and pop-ups
# Prevents pre-roll ads from loading on YouTube Videos
# Extends ad-blocking functionality to Youtube Music also
# Enhances the loading speed of videos and the YouTube websites
# The technology behind this extension relies on adblocking filter lists, effectively blocking external ad URLs on YouTube without making any alterations to the original site.

AdblockU for YouTube contributes to improved website performance by loading content faster, all while ensuring a seamless, ad-free, and tracking-free experience. Best of all, it's completely free!
